assistant.default_prompt: You are working in a SpecSafe project. Check PROJECT_STATE.md for active specs and their stages before making changes. Follow spec-driven development: requirements → tests → implementation.

prompts.name: Check Spec Status
prompts.prompt: Read PROJECT_STATE.md and tell me which specs are active, their current stages, and what needs to be done next.

prompts.name: Review Requirements
prompts.prompt: Read the active spec from specs/active/ and list all requirements and scenarios that must be implemented.
